attributes.action: Allow sale of Covid vaccines to all those who wish to uptake it
attributes.additional_details: Because you do so for flu and others. So why not something as sinister as such?
attributes.background: Allow those who wish to take a Covid vaccine be able to do so at their own cost

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Vaccines that have been licensed by the Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency for use in the United Kingdom can be prescribed by a physician, either in the National Health Service or privately.

The Government has said that, as yet, the pharmaceutical companies producing COVID-19 vaccines have not made these treatments commercially available to the private health care sector in the UK either through pharmacies or other healthcare providers, but this is a matter for pharmaceutical companies, not the Government or Parliament.
